author: The US Sun - Sean Keach, Head of Technology and Science
title: SUPER CELL Apple reveals ‘two simple ways’ to boost battery life – and says Wi-Fi mistake could be ruining it for you | Flipboard
text: SUPER CELL Apple reveals ‘two simple ways’ to boost battery life – and says Wi-Fi mistake could be ruining it for you APPLE has revealed two ways to instantly reduce the strain on your battery. If you're worried about running out of charge, two iPhone settings in … [Marcella Glenn](/@marcellagle2014) flipped this story into [A LOOK AT LIFE](/@marcellagle2014/a-look-at-life-ja8397djz)•14h Related storyboards Related articles [Organize Your iPhone Home Screen & Apps](/@ellieelizab2015/iphone-a8s62atmz/organize-your-iphone-home-screen-apps/a-NhNzU1HwTU61NJNalIVy8w%3Aa%3A1134057055-988d89d492%2Fiphonelife.com) Your app collection is one area that can quickly make your iPhone feel disorganized. Your Home Screen becomes cluttered and soon you’re swiping through page after page, trying to figure out where the three apps you actually use ended up. Here are some tips to get your apps under control.
